content: The Earth has a radius of about 6,371 kilometers (3,959 miles) and a diameter of about 12,742 kilometers (7,918 miles). It is the third planet from the Sun and the fifth-largest planet in our solar system.
what color does the dutch flag has ?
The Dutch flag consists of three horizontal stripes of equal width. The top stripe is red, the middle stripe is white, and the bottom stripe is blue.
what color does the french flag has ?
The French flag, commonly known as the "Tricolour," consists of three vertical stripes of equal width. The left stripe is blue, the middle stripe is white, and the right stripe is red.
